name: AnsiUp DX
description:
Created for #ansijam and #shmupjam.

This is an early 90's style shmup (stg) featuring ANSI art graphics made in PabloDraw. It takes much inspiration from Raiden and Raiden II.

Features:

  • Drop in drop out local multiplayer.
  • Selectable controls per player, you can even control both ships with one controller!
  • Pseudo-turn based Dogmatic mode.
  • Endless score attack!

Notes:

  • You can mute audio by pressing 0, or adjust volume with - and = keys.
  • The game currently runs at a fixed height of 960 pixels for optimal display of the ascii characters. I may add a half size resolution later.
  • This game is in a playable state but will still be in further development. Follow on my blog and on twitter @edenicholas

0.4 Changes:

  • Music

0.3 Changes:

  • Collect medals for extra score. Collect each one to build higher score bonus.
  • Better variety in enemy attack formations.
  • Defeating the boss at the end of the wave increases difficulty slightly.
